#Text=The Detroit Pistons ( 24 - 21 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 19 - 25 ) 95 - 92 on Monday night .
#Text=In a battle between two stingy defenses , the identities of the teams really stood out .
#Text=Both teams wanted to muck this game down and play halfcourt , which is just what they did .
#Text=The Pistons took a 12 - point lead into the half and never relinquished it after that .
#Text=Detroit held Utah to 40 percent shooting , while shooting 45 percent on their end of the floor .
#Text=Th three - point shooting was key as well , as the Pistons went 11 - for - 22 , while the Jazz went just 9 - for - 29 .
#Text=Detroit played far from efficient here , but they managed to pull out a huge win on the road .
#Text=Reggie Jackson was the hero tonight , as he tallied 29 points and four assists in the win .
#Text=That looks even bigger considering Andre Drummond and Marcus Morris combined for just nine points and 10 rebounds in the victory .
#Text=The form of Drummond has to be worrisome , as that is now two dud performances in a row for the potential All-Star .
#Text=He went just 1 - for - 10 from the free - throw line here and it 's starting to effect the rest of his game right now .
#Text=The only other player who played well for the Pistons here aside from Jackson was Ersan Ilyasova , who amassed 16 points and eight rebounds .
#Text=The Pistons have a good chance at another win in their next game , when they host the Philadelphia 76ers on Wednesday .
#Text=The Jazz have been a bit of a disappointment this season , but this loss does have big implications for the future .
#Text=Derrick Favors made his return here after a 13 - game absence and he 's a beautiful sight for Utah fans .
#Text=He came off the bench here and scored 14 points in 20 minutes , but he should be at full force in weeks to come .
#Text=It was just four players tonight that showed up for Utah , as Favors , Gordon Hayward , Rudy Gobert and Rodney Hood combined for nearly all of the offense .
#Text=In fact , they scored all but 16 points in this game between the four of them and that 's hard to overcome in an NBA game .
#Text=Gobert was especially good tonight , as he tallied 17 points and 17 rebounds in one of his best games of the season .
#Text=Hayward had a nice all - around game as well , as he accumulated 22 points , five rebounds and five assists in the defeat .
#Text=He did however miss a game - tying three at the buzzer that would have sent the game into overtime .
#Text=Utah will look to play better in their next game on Wednesday against the struggling Charlotte Hornets .
